items.title: Bringing In $251K A Year With 3 Jobs In The Bay Area

ai.summary: Based on the available description, Naseema McElroy, 44, is a labor and delivery nurse in Brentwood, California who launched a personal finance brand, Financially Intentional, to document her debt payoff journey. She went from nearly $1 million in debt in 2015 to being debt-free by 2017 and, per the video title, brings in $251K a year across three jobs; this profile is part of CNBC Make It's Millennial Money series.

items.title: Cloud Cost Efficiency I The Keys to AWS Optimization | S16 E2
